#summary About crashrpt

*CrashRpt* library is an open-source error handling framework. The library intercepts  SEH exceptions and CRT errors generated by a user-mode application. CrashRpt DLL works like Windows Error Reporting tool that ships with Windows Vista. 

CrashRpt intercepts an unhandled exception, creates a minidump, builds a crash description in XML format, presents an interface to allow user to review the crash report, and finally compresses and sends the crash report to the software support team. 

CrashRpt can deliver error reports using HTTP request, SMTP connection and through Simple MAPI. In addition, CrashRpt is well documented, so its easy to start using it in your project.
